#summary How to set up a TortoiseSVN client for Windows.

= Introduction =

This project Subversion (SVN) as a version control system. To download source code and commit your own changes you will need to install a SVN client on your local computer. There are several of these available, this guide should get you up and running with TortoiseSVN which is freely available under the GNU General Public Licence.
